title: Nintendo Wii
content:
Can anybody identify the font used in the Nintendo "Wii" (horrible name) logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wii1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100313175143/http:/typophile.com/files/wii1.jpg) | 16.27 KB |
author: tartarus

comments.content: Nintendo has been using [Infinity](http://web.archive.org/web/20100313175143/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Infinity/mudTyper+Weights/), but that's not it this time.
